sections.description: This plug-in enables additional fields in WooCommerce for synchronization with Wristler.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the plugin using WordPress or FTP
  2. Enable the plug-in
  3. Navigate to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Integrations -> Wristler and fill in your security token.
  4. Fill in the fields on the products you want to publish on Wristler.
sections.changelog: Changelog can be found at Github.
